column6:

column8:
Ugh! She's late!
What's keeping Usagi?

column6: Usagi+-san++ had some urgent business to attend to.
column8: Usagi-san had some urgent business to attend to.

column6: She asked me to tell you to go on ahead without her.
column8: She asked me to tell you to go on ahead without her.

column6: Are these the eyes of a liar?
column8: Are these the eyes of a liar?

column6: S-Since you can't go with her....
column8: S-Since you can't go with her....

column6: M-MAYBE WE COULD WALK THE WAY HOME TOGETHER??
column8: M-Maybe we could walk the way home together??

column6: It looks like they're getting along well.
column8: It looks like they're getting along well.

Ah, Mizuno-san!
Mizuno-san, are you going home?

column6:
She's so mean!
We were supposed to walk home together,
column8:

column6:
but apparently she has some urgent business.

column8:
but apparently she has some urgent business.

column6: No, I haven't. I was in the library until a few minutes ago.
column8: No, I haven't. I was in the library until a few minutes ago.

column6: That doesn't seem like something Usagi+-chan++ would do, though.
column8: That doesn't seem like something Usagi-chan would do, however.

column6: (Come to think of it, Naru+-chan++ has been targeted by Youma quite often.
column8: (Come to think of it, Naru-chan has been targeted by Youma quite often.

column6: She may know something about those shadows...)
column8: She may know something about those shadows...)

column6: Naru+-chan++, has anything happened to you recently?
column8: Naru-chan, has something happened to you recently?

column6:
Hm? No, nothing out of the ordinary.

column8:

column6: No reason. I'm glad everything's fine.
column8: No reason. I'm glad everything's fine.

column6: Naru+-chan++, have you been keeping up with your studies?
column8: Naru-chan, have you been keeping up with your studies?

column6: ...Isn't it about time we stopped him?
